ygData.subject: Re: Searching for wreckage
ygData.msgSnippet: What I might do is make a site dedicated to Tinker Research. I have some web space. here are some key ideas - make a map of OOT, let people download it .
ygData.messageBody:
What I might do is make a site dedicated to Tinker Research. I have some
web space. here are some key ideas

- make a map of OOT, let people download it . search an area of it, Shade
the area they have searched, Sumbit it back to me. I will then shade the
area on a MASTER copy, that way over time we will widen up a seach in oot.

- Make a section about Tattred Gnomish Cloak, Failed Combos.
- Make a section about the searching of the Diamond Dust.

- BTW crushed Dufrinte does not work I tried it.

What do you all Thing ? Should I do it ?
